body: Job descriptionIf you are a talented iOS Developer who wants to work on cutting edge projects remotely, It would be your ideal project.Core Responsibilities    Design and develop iOS for a long-term project in a  talented team.    Have a published iOS app    Have experience communicating with web services and socket programming    Be comfortable with debugging iOS apps and instruments    Handle multiple client and internal projects simultaneously    Be able to implement pixel perfect designsThis is a remote job opportunity. Desired Skills and Experience    1-4 yrs of professional experience in developing mobile applications for iPhone    Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle    Experience with third-party libraries and APIs and local database integration.     Strong Object Oriented design and programming skills in Objective-C and swift    Good working experience in iOS SDK (Cocoa Touch, UIKit, Core Data, Core Location, etc.) and XCode.    Experience in web service integration (REST, JSON, SOCKET) is desired.    Good analytical and problem solving skills.    Experience in remote working
title: Remote iOS Developer
